mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DDOTMESSAGE (SEQ, NICKNAME, SENDTO, CONTENT, WDATE, READ, DEL) VALUES(SEQ_DDOTMESSAGE.nextval, #{nickname}, #{sendto}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 2)
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, NICKNAME, SENDTO, CONTENT, WDATE, READ, DEL FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY WDATE DESC) as rnum, SEQ, NICKNAME, SENDTO, CONTENT, WDATE, READ, DEL FROM DDOTMESSAGE WHERE 1 = 1 ) A WHERE rnum between ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT NVL(count(*),0) AS cnt FROM DDOTMESSAGE WHERE 1 = 1
